attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All bicycles should be licensed with an easily read number on the back so they could be reported when the break the law, i.e. cycling through red lights, cycling over pedestrian crossing when everyone else has to stop. They might be a greener way of tavelling but they should also uphold the law

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
